0.1.name: wordpress/dge-slideshow
0.1.description:
The plugin takes an image source (e.g. RSS feed or web page), passes it through XSLT via the DGE_InlineRSS plugin, then uses javascript and css in the client to do the actual slideshow.

Because of the use of XSLT, it's fairly flexible, allowing new image sources to be made available quickly.

It's still under development, but working nicely on Firefox 1.5, 2.0, IE 6 (Win) and 7. Please feel free to submit bugs and suggest features by posting questions etc on the home page.
